attributes.action: Make all drugs that are available in Scotland and Wales available in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been new medicines released and have been available in Scotland or Wales and not available in England. This is unacceptable as English tax payers are funding these medicines but they're not available to them! 

Medicine available on the NHS should be made available throughout the UK!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
